system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice patterns_with to and -ing by Describing entertainment preferences with 'enjoy + ing'. I want to ensure that I can use 'enjoy' followed by the '-ing' form. For example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Let's do a Q&A exercise. You (the AI) are a friendly English tutor. Mention movies or series you enjoy watching and concerts you enjoy going to, then ask me similar questions. (e.g. 'I enjoy watching horror movies. How about you?', 'Do you enjoy going to concerts? Why?', 'Do you enjoy watching TV to relax?') Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Describing entertainment preferences with 'enjoy + ing', using, for example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy watching comedy movies because they make me laugh. How about you? What kind of movies do you enjoy watching?
I enjoy watching action movies because they are exciting.
That’s great! I also enjoy going to music concerts because I love listening to live music. Do you enjoy going to concerts? What kind of music do you like?
That’s okay! Do you enjoy watching TV shows to relax? What kind of shows do you like?
I enjoy watching drama shows because they are interesting.

That’s nice! I enjoy watching drama shows too because they tell great stories. It was fun talking about entertainment with you. Keep practicing, and you’ll get even better at English! Goodbye for now!
Goodbye! Thank you for practicing with me. Keep enjoying your favorite shows and movies, and have fun learning English!
Great work! You’ve finished the task. Talk to you later! Keep practicing and enjoy improving your English skills! Goodbye!
